pullrequest.title: Fix example usage of ${prefix} in gazebo_ros export tag.

content.raw: I’m actually not sure where `gazebo_media_path` is supposed to point because I can't find any clear documentation on it. `gazebo_model_path=”${prefix}/models”`, would be correct, because models are usually in `share/models`, but I’m not sure about `gazebo_media_path`.
content.html: I’m actually not sure where gazebo_media_path is supposed to point because I can't find any clear documentation on it. gazebo_model_path=”${prefix}/models”, would be correct, because models are usually in share/models, but I’m not sure about gazebo_media_path.
